org.apache.flink.cep.pattern

类 Pattern<T,F extends T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.cep.pattern.Pattern<T,F>
  • 类型参数:
    T - Base type of the elements appearing in the pattern
    F - Subtype of T to which the current pattern operator is constrained
    直接已知子类:
    FollowedByPattern

    public class Pattern<T,F extends T>
extends Object
    Base class for a pattern definition.

    A pattern definition is used by NFACompiler to create a NFA. 

    
 Pattern<T, F> pattern = Pattern.<T>begin("start")
   .next("middle").subtype(F.class)
   .followedBy("end").where(new MyFilterFunction());

      • getName

        public String getName()

      • getPrevious

        public Pattern<T,? extends T> getPrevious()

      • getFilterFunction

        public org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.FilterFunction<F> getFilterFunction()

      • getWindowTime

        public org.apache.flink.streaming.api.windowing.time.Time getWindowTime()

      • where

        public Pattern<T,F> where(org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.FilterFunction<F> newFilterFunction)
        Specifies a filter condition which has to be fulfilled by an event in order to be matched.
        参数:
        newFilterFunction - Filter condition
        返回:
        The same pattern operator where the new filter condition is set

      • subtype

        public <S extends F> Pattern<T,S> subtype(Class<S> subtypeClass)
        Applies a subtype constraint on the current pattern operator. This means that an event has to be of the given subtype in order to be matched.
        类型参数:
        S - Type of the subtype
        参数:
        subtypeClass - Class of the subtype
        返回:
        The same pattern operator with the new subtype constraint

      • within

        public Pattern<T,F> within(org.apache.flink.streaming.api.windowing.time.Time windowTime)
        Defines the maximum time interval for a matching pattern. This means that the time gap between first and the last event must not be longer than the window time.
        参数:
        windowTime - Time of the matching window
        返回:
        The same pattenr operator with the new window length

      • next

        public Pattern<T,T> next(String name)
        Appends a new pattern operator to the existing one. The new pattern operator enforces strict temporal contiguity. This means that the whole pattern only matches if an event which matches this operator directly follows the preceding matching event. Thus, there cannot be any events in between two matching events.
        参数:
        name - Name of the new pattern operator
        返回:
        A new pattern operator which is appended to this pattern operator

      • followedBy

        public FollowedByPattern<T,T> followedBy(String name)
        Appends a new pattern operator to the existing one. The new pattern operator enforces non-strict temporal contiguity. This means that a matching event of this operator and the preceding matching event might be interleaved with other events which are ignored.
        参数:
        name - Name of the new pattern operator
        返回:
        A new pattern operator which is appended to this pattern operator

      • begin

        public static <X> Pattern<X,X> begin(String name)
        Starts a new pattern with the initial pattern operator whose name is provided. Furthermore, the base type of the event sequence is set.
        类型参数:
        X - Base type of the event pattern
        参数:
        name - Name of the new pattern operator
        返回:
        The first pattern operator of a pattern
